description:
Turn your bolt-on holds into screw-ons. These little Screw Caps slot into the bolt holes on your climbing holds, letting you use a screw instead of a bolt, so you're not limited by your T-nut placement.

  • Fits in Allen head bolt holes
  • Accommodates #8 and #9 screws
  • Screws are not as strong as bolts. Consider using with smaller or slopier holds
name: Binary Holds Screw Caps - 25 Pack
